summary: Alters the sun magic spells from Dawnguard to be effective against all creature types, but extra effective against undead creatures.
descriptionHtml:
This mod alters the sun magic spells from Dawnguard (Sun Fire, Stendarr's Aura, and Vampire's Bane) to be effective against all creature types, but do 50% extra damage against undead creatures.

In addition, the Recovery perk now boosts the power of sun magic by 25% per rank, much like the destruction tree's perks.

Finally, magicka cost and skill experience have been adjusted slightly.
author: Team Qoolaid
